channel.title: SLowing Down The X Bow
channel.description: well in my server the karils x bow hits rapidly like seriously very rapid... and i also dont want it to hit so high so often... can someone plz help me fix this as of i have no clue how..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2009, 06:08:03 pm[/size][hr]can anyone help?

item.title: SLowing Down The X Bow
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Add a weapon timer and change the max hit in the client class.
